ComicInfo.Penciller: Alex Toth,Bruno Premiani,Dick Dillin,Jerry Grandenetti,Joe Maneely,Nick Cardy,Rich Buckler,Dick Dillin,Rich Buckler,Joe Maneely,Bruno Premiani,Alex Toth,Jerry Grandenetti
ComicInfo.Summary:
While on his deathbed, Hiram makes a deal with a mysterious figure for one more hour of life.
Mrs. McDougal, an old cat lady, has a disagreement with your landlord.
Charlie Kimble hears the voices of his dead cellmates.
A twin is having memory problems, uncertain which one he is.
Three criminals kill an old prospector hoping to find his cache of gold.
How silk gauze was used to deceive seance patrons.
ComicInfo.Writer: Dave Wood,George Kashdan,Murray Boltinoff,Al Case,George Kashdan,Al Case,Dave Wood
ComicInfo.Title: You Are Cordially Invited-- to Die!; A Cat Tale; The Doomsday Drum; Please Let Me Die!; The Town That Buried Me Alive!; Seek Your Own Grave!; Silk Gauze
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Letterer: Ray Holloway,John Costanza,Stan Starkman,Ray Holloway,John Costanza,Stan Starkman
